dct_title_s: Kyoto City Map / Kyoto City Tourist Association.
dct_description_sm: Recto: information about tourist information centers, Kyoto city map, and insets of Kameoka city area, Keihoku town area, and Uji city area. Verso: Area maps of Kyoto's central area, Arashiyama/Sagano area, Kinkakuji/Uzumasa area, and Shisen-do/Shugaku-in area with recommended walking routes. Includes business advertisements with color illustrations.
